name: Skeledirge
flavorText: The fiery bird changes shape when Skeledirge sings. Rumor has it that the bird was born when the fireball on Skeledirge’s head gained a soul.

previous.name: Crocalor
previous.flavorText: The combination of Crocalor’s fire energy and overflowing vitality has caused an egg-shaped fireball to appear on the Pokémon’s head.

next.name: Quaxly
next.flavorText: This Pokémon migrated to Paldea from distant lands long ago. The gel secreted by its feathers repels water and grime."

pokemon.name: Fuecoco
pokemon.flavorText: It lies on warm rocks and uses the heat absorbed by its square-shaped scales to create fire energy.

pokemon.name: Crocalor
pokemon.flavorText: The combination of Crocalor’s fire energy and overflowing vitality has caused an egg-shaped fireball to appear on the Pokémon’s head.

pokemon.name: Skeledirge
pokemon.flavorText: The fiery bird changes shape when Skeledirge sings. Rumor has it that the bird was born when the fireball on Skeledirge’s head gained a soul.
